statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: During the Mult-University Trainging,Coach Yehr asks all the ACM teammates to jog at 6:30AM.But 6:30 is too early,there are always somebody might be late.Coach Yehr likes AC sequence very much,the AC sequence is a number sequence with all the elements different.A sequence (S<sub>1</sub> ,S<sub>2</sub> ,S<sub>3</sub> ……S<sub>n</sub> ) is a AC sequence if S<sub>1</sub> ,S<sub>2</sub> ,S<sub>3</sub> ……S<sub>n</sub> are all different. There are N teammates,the time(in second time) every teammate’arrival make a number sequence with length N. In order to punish the laters,Coach Yehr give them a puzzle,Coach Yehr choose a subsequence from S<sub>a</sub>  to S<sub>b</sub> ,the laters must tell Coach Yehr the longest length of AC sequence in the subsequence as soon as possible.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
There are multiply text cases.You must deal with it until the end of file.
The first line of each test case is an interger N,indicates the number of ACM teammates;
The second line have N intergers,the i-th number indicates the i-th teammate’s arrival time.
The third line is an interger M indicates Coach Yehr will ask M times;
The follow M lines,each line have two intergers a and b,indicate the interval of the sequence.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each query,you have to print the longest length of AC sequence in the subsequence in a single line.
